overview:
Bin Xu heads the engineering, technical operations and quality assurance departments at Magnet Systems Inc.

Before joining Magnet Systems, Mr. Xu spent over four years as the VP of engineering and technical operations at oDesk Corporation, the largest and fastest-growing global online employment platform service that enables employers to hire, manage and pay a flexible online workforce. Mr. Xu led the effort to grow and run the in-office and the distributed online teams for product development, quality assurance and data center operations.

Prior to oDesk, Mr. Xu led the application development at WebEx Communications and was responsible for all product releases of Meeting Center, Event Center, Training Center, Sales Center, Support Center, SmartTech and WebACD from 2002 to 2006.
